mapper.select: SELECT diary_id AS diaryId, diary_name AS diaryName, diary_content AS diaryContent, diary_image AS diaryImage, created_at AS createdAt, mood FROM diary WHERE member_no_login = #{memberNoLogin} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT diary_id AS diaryId, diary_name AS diaryName, diary_content AS diaryContent, diary_image AS diaryImage, created_at AS createdAt, mood FROM diary WHERE diary_id = #{diaryId} AND member_no_login = #{memberNoLogin}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary ( member_no_login, diary_name, diary_content, diary_image, mood, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memberNoLogin}, #{diaryName}, #{diaryContent}, #{diaryImage}, #{mood}, NOW() )
